HR EXECUTIVE

(Indian automobile manufacturing company)
Mar'12 - Apr'12 (2 Months) Developed a HR Metrics including a Drill to Detail option, allowing users to "see the people behind the numbers." Integrated trends requiring intervention and facilitated for internal benchmarking Incorporated the aspects of Training & Development, Reward System, Benefits, Motivation, Corporate Social Responsibility & Safety for developing the balance score card The metric and scorecard was put into use in the Ennore plant since May & the same was highly appreciated by the plants core team Ashok Leyland
(Indian automobile manufacturing company)
Feb'12 - Mar'12 (1 Month) Completed a Project on "Organizational Climate" in "Ashok Leyland's corporate office, Guindy.
Prepared & conducted a survey with the corporate office employees on the Environment, Management Effectiveness, Involvement, Rewards and recognition & Commitment aspects Proposed solutions for the aspects where we were lacking behind than the internal benchmarked value Experience (1 year 10 months) Dr.Kamakshi Memorial Hospital Pvt Ltd
Nov'12 - Sep'14 Working in the core quality team to obtain National Accreditation Board for Hospitals & Healthcare Providers (NABH) certification Revamping the organizational structure & redesigning effective on boarding processes and tools to facilitate the integration of new employees Core Team member facilitating the feasibility study of an integrated payroll package,EPF,ESI and all Statutory Compliances for the hospital employees.
Acting as a Training Coordinator cum Trainer.
Maintaining leave records database, all employees credentials,personal records, Training tracker and training calendar etc.
Preparation of SOP's, HR Manuals, Join score cards,Proposing & Salary increments,Preparation of salary statement.
Arranging and conducting Interviews, Initial Screening the candidates.
Preparing and Issuing of HR Offer letters,Appointment letters.
Preparing & Conducting Induction programme of new onboarding employees.
Proper Training upgradation programme for the employees & Evaluating the effective of training programmes.
Preparation of KPI/KRA's for all the designation.
Attend to Employee's Grievances & Complaints & provide guidance if necessary.
Internship SAP implementation for Export department Studied the logistics business process in exports business of Ashok Leyland As core team member prepared the order to cash and Make to deliver As-Is process for SAP implementation Search Engines & web crawling Completed a project in web crawling for faster indexing & for enhancing the speed of search engines Extra Curricular Activities Completed Certified Associate in Project Management (CAPM) certification course from Project Management Institute(PMI) Attended Therapeutic Communication Training.
Conducted a National-level workshop on "Work Life Balance" to staff and non-teaching staff of Crescent Business School.
Presented a working paper on "Industrial Relations in coca cola" in Vels University.
Attended a conference on "Entrepreneurship management" in ISBR Business School As an active member of HRD CLUB, was responsible for arranging quarterly Conferences & alumni meetings Won the college level event in Tennikoit and acted as a Captain of the team.

C, C++, English, Hindi, Java, Languages, Microsoft Office, SQL, Visual Basic 6.0

<JD_START>
Job Title: Human Resources Business Partner

Location: Sugar Land, TX

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Human Resources, Training

Description:
SUMMARY
AMS HR Business Partner will be responsible for ensuring, for the AMS Region (North America) effective execution of all HR processes with particular focus on talent management that includes communication and people development, as well as the organizational alignment to business needs, in strict coordination with the General Manager, Global HR Director of the division and Corporate HR.
ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES include the following. Other duties may be assigned.
• Participate as required in the development of the HR and Division business plans and programs, particularly from the perspective of the impact on people. Translate them into HR operational plans in application of the guidance and inputs received by HR Corporate,• Define the yearly HR budget and plan in coordination with Corporate HR, Regional Hub General Manager and the Global HR Director,• Ensure the effective use and maintenance of the proper tools (SuccessFactors, etc.),• Manage, in strict coordination with Corporate HR, Regional Hub General Manager and the Global HR Director continuous people management and development including competence/performance assessment, training, succession planning, internal job rotation, international mobility, etc., • Be the point of reference for all workers, employees and company management for identifying and managing all people development path• Advice executives and managers in the most effective communication and interaction with people,• Manage the organizational structure and role grading and description in coherence with the approved budget and the company and people needs, applying the guidelines provided by HR Corporate,• Manage internal communication and events boosting a positive internal climate, developing consistent actions plan in response to company surveys to boost it as required,• Liaise and lobby with schools, colleges/universities and professional communities to identify and boost partnerships and mutual opportunities. Pursue the best practices and programs to attract, select and recruit “talents”.
QUALIFICATIONS 
At least 3 years related experience in HR management within multinational companiesPreviously held leadership rolesKnowledge/experience in: Local labor disciplines Managing HR economicsAble to travel 10-20% of time to other De Nora facilities as required.
EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCEBachelors or Masters degree in Human Resources; Bachelors in Business Administration or equivalent
CERTIFICATES, LICENSES, REGISTRATIONSNone
PHYSICAL DEMANDSReasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential job functions

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
<JD_END>
